modification.id: [VQMOD] Opencart v2.1.x: Increase time in shopping cart for products
modification.author: kanenas.net (aka Nikolas Branis) - nbran@kanenas.net

operation.search: $this->db->query("DELETE FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "cart WHERE (api_id > '0' OR customer_id = '0') AND date_added < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)");
operation.add: $this->db->query("DELETE FROM " . DB_PREFIX . "cart WHERE (api_id > '0' OR customer_id = '0') AND date_added < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 HOUR)");
